mapper.insert: INSERT INTO list(list_title, list_content, list_user_nick, list_hit_cnt, list_cate, list_loc, list_money) VALUES (#{listTitle},#{listContent},'테스터','0','0',#{listLoc},#{listMoney})
mapper.select: SELECT list_idx, list_title, list_content, list_user_nick, list_create_date, list_completed_yn, list_cate , list_loc, list_money, COALESCE( (SELECT b.list_image_name FROM list_image AS b WHERE list.list_idx = b.list_image_list_idx LIMIT 1), 'noImage' ) AS list_image_name FROM list WHERE list_title LIKE '%${Search}%' OR list_content LIKE '%${Search}%' ORDER BY list_idx DESC

SELECT list_idx, list_title, list_content, list_user_nick, list_create_date, list_completed_yn, list_cate, list_loc, list_money, COALESCE( (SELECT b.list_image_name FROM list_image AS b WHERE a.list_idx = b.list_image_list_idx LIMIT 1), 22 ) AS list_image_name FROM list AS a ORDER BY list_idx DESC

SELECT list_idx, list_title, list_content, list_user_nick, list_create_date, list_completed_yn,list_cate, list_loc, list_money FROM list WHERE list_user_nick = #{userNick} AND list_cate = 0 AND list_sell_state = 0 AND list_completed_yn = 'N' ORDER BY list_idx DESC;

SELECT list_idx, list_title, list_content, list_user_nick, list_create_date, list_completed_yn,list_cate, list_loc, list_money FROM list WHERE list_user_nick = #{userNick} AND list_cate = 0 AND list_sell_state = 1 AND list_completed_yn = 'N' ORDER BY list_update_date DESC;

SELECT list_idx, list_title, list_content, list_user_nick, list_create_date, list_completed_yn,list_cate, list_loc, list_money FROM list WHERE list_user_nick = #{userNick} AND list_cate = 0 AND list_sell_state = 2 AND list_completed_yn = 'N' ORDER BY list_update_date DESC;
mapper.update: UPDATE list SET list_sell_state = 0, list_update_date = NOW() WHERE list_idx = #{listIdx}
UPDATE list SET list_sell_state = 1, list_update_date = NOW() WHERE list_idx = #{listIdx}
UPDATE list SET list_sell_state = 2, list_update_date = NOW() WHERE list_idx = #{listIdx}
UPDATE list SET list_completed_yn = 'Y' WHERE list_idx = #{listIdx}
